headline: Shopify Inc. (SHOP): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Shopify Inc. Stock Analysis Compilation’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on SHOP. Shopify Inc. ‘s share was trading at $114.77 as of July 2nd. SHOP’s trailing and forward P/E were 93.31 and 78.12 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Shopify is redefining the e-commerce landscape by […]

headline: LRT Capital Management June 2025 Investor Update
summary: During the month of June the LRT Global Opportunities strategy returned -1.30% net of fees. Year-to-date, the strategy has returned +8.12%. Read more here.
